argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | fsumsplitsn.ph | |- F/ k ph |
| 2 |  | fsumsplitsn.kd | |- F/_ k D |
| 3 |  | fsumsplitsn.a | |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) |
| 4 |  | fsumsplitsn.b | |- ( ph -> B e. V ) |
| 5 |  | fsumsplitsn.ba | |- ( ph -> -. B e. A ) |
| 6 |  | fsumsplitsn.c | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> C e. CC ) |
| 7 |  | fsumsplitsn.d | |- ( k = B -> C = D ) |
| 8 |  | fsumsplitsn.dcn | |- ( ph -> D e. CC ) |
| 9 |  | #P_disjsn | |- ( ( A i^i { B } ) = (/) <-> -. B e. A ) |
| 10 | 5, 9 | #P_sylibr | |- ( ph -> ( A i^i { B } ) = (/) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eqidd | |- ( ph -> ( A u. { B } ) = ( A u. { B } ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_snfi | |- { B } e. Fin |
| 13 | 12 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> { B } e. Fin ) |
| 14 |  | #P_unfi | |- ( ( A e. Fin /\ { B } e. Fin ) -> ( A u. { B } ) e. Fin ) |
| 15 | 3, 13, 14 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> ( A u. { B } ) e. Fin ) |
| 16 | 6 | #P_adantlr | |- ( ( ( ph /\ k e. ( A u. { B } ) ) /\ k e. A ) -> C e. CC ) |
| 17 |  | #P_simpll | |- ( ( ( ph /\ k e. ( A u. { B } ) ) /\ -. k e. A ) -> ph ) |
| 18 |  | #P_elunnel1 | |- ( ( k e. ( A u. { B } ) /\ -. k e. A ) -> k e. { B } ) |
| 19 |  | #P_elsni | |- ( k e. { B } -> k = B ) |
| 20 | 18, 19 | #P_syl | |- ( ( k e. ( A u. { B } ) /\ -. k e. A ) -> k = B ) |
| 21 | 20 | #P_adantll | |- ( ( ( ph /\ k e. ( A u. { B } ) ) /\ -. k e. A ) -> k = B ) |
| 22 | 7 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ph /\ k = B ) -> C = D ) |
| 23 | 8 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ k = B ) -> D e. CC ) |
| 24 | 22, 23 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( ( ph /\ k = B ) -> C e. CC ) |
| 25 | 17, 21, 24 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( ( ph /\ k e. ( A u. { B } ) ) /\ -. k e. A ) -> C e. CC ) |
| 26 | 16, 25 | #P_pm2.61dan | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( A u. { B } ) ) -> C e. CC ) |
| 27 | 1, 10, 11, 15, 26 | #P_fsumsplitf | |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. ( A u. { B } ) C = ( sum_ k e. A C + sum_ k e. { B } C ) ) |
| 28 | 2, 7 | #P_sumsnf | |- ( ( B e. V /\ D e. CC ) -> sum_ k e. { B } C = D ) |
| 29 | 4, 8, 28 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. { B } C = D ) |
| 30 | 29 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ph -> ( sum_ k e. A C + sum_ k e. { B } C ) = ( sum_ k e. A C + D ) ) |
| 31 | 27, 30 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. ( A u. { B } ) C = ( sum_ k e. A C + D ) ) |
